DOC.brief_summary: Determine efficacy brief inexpensive psychosocial intervention , ( call expressive write ) improve health outcome cancer survivor .
DOC.detailed_description: This study aim evaluate computer-based stress-management therapy call expressive writing . This involve log online survey write survey thought feeling cancer type everyday experience . This require 20-30 minute write day 4 consecutive day . You also provide saliva sample .
